nodes.text: The Hanging Gardens were located on the grounds of the Alaphoe Gardens on Procopia in the Tapani sector. They were the centerpiece of the Alaphoe Gardens on Lalos Island and the pride and joy of House Cadriaans High Lady Bathos during the Galactic Civil War period.
The wooden trellises and flowerbeds contained numerous rare and delicate flowers from a hundred different worlds. The air was scented with the sweet fragrance of the flowers.
